ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: We said in Section 21.6 that mechanistic studies on ester hydrolysis have been carried out using ethyl propanoate labeled with 18O in the ether-like oxygen. Assume that 18O-labeled acetic acid is your only source of isotopic oxygen, and then propose a synthesis of the labeled ethyl propanoate.
